name: Process wise Production Report
query:
select 
	production_order as "Production Order:Link/Production Order:100",
	rejected_qty as "Rejected Quantity:Data:120",
ifnull(sum(case when process='Shearing' then completed_job else 0 end),0) as Shearing,
ifnull(sum(case when process='Welding' then completed_job else 0 end),0) as Welding,
ifnull(sum(case when process='Cutting' then completed_job else 0 end),0) as Cutting
from `tabJob Order Detail` 
group by production_order;
